A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Now that the newest and final story is out\, I have a newfound respect and love for this film. It is the only film in the newest trilogy with new stories and ideas which could have ushered in a great and meaningful story end with actual growth. The political slight against The Last Jedi by The Rise of Skywalker is one of the most blatant cases of apologetic fan service by a major corporation to the nerd opiate\, instead of letting the franchise (like many before) finish with the honor of making hard choices\, good or bad.
